title: Corporate logo from TV show helix
author: Quellcrist

comments.content:
For ARCTIC I would suggest [Bitsumishi Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701111522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/bitsumishi-pro-v2/?refby=bowfin) Bold, with the A and R having a little surgery to remove a bit of the existing letters. The overall shape seems to match pretty well.

- Mike Yanega

You nailed it, it s the exact font, the A and R are actually lower cases.

The old free Bitsumishi is also usable, the font was stretched horizontaly + 162% for that logo .

Second line (BIOSYSTEMS) seems to be Helvetica LT Std Roman with tracking at +600 and horizontal stretch similar to the bitsumishi (Which show that Helvetica is really everywhere....)

Thanks a lot

ps: i was able to pretty much replicate the logo thanks to bowfinpw

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701111522im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Artic%20Biosystems%20Compare_4598.png)

Top original (and illustrator made some ungodly things to it :) )  
Bottom replica
